articles.description: Ajay Devgn and Ranveer Singh reunited with Rohit Shetty as he begun the shoot for 'Singham Again'. Akshay Kumar, who is currently in London, sent his best wishes to the team.
articles.content: Rohit Shetty’s cop universe is all set to move ahead. The director had announced that ‘Singham Again’ will be made super soon and Singham Ajay Devgn will be back on the screen. Now, the time has come… [+2083 chars]
